info.title: Legend Life - Decoration API Documentation
info.description: Authentication is required to access the API. Visit the [API Data Feed](https://www.legendlife.com.au/integrations/index/) to get your API key and learn more about the API usage.

get.summary: Can the provided SKU(s) be decorated?

parameters.name: skus
parameters.description: An array of SKUs for which the data is being requested.

items.description: The SKU of the product for which the data is being requested.

get.summary: Get the MOQ for a decoration type on a specific SKU

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: The SKU of the product for which the data is being requested.

parameters.name: decorationType
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration type requested, returned by the
`/decorations/v1/decorationTypes` endpoint.

get.summary: Get the decoration options for a SKU and decoration type

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: The SKU of the decoration option.

parameters.name: decorationType
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration type requested, returned by the
`/decorations/v1/decorationTypes` endpoint.

parameters.name: decorationPosition
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration position requested, returned by the
`/decorations/v1/decorationPositions` endpoint.

parameters.name: decorationItem
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration item requested, returned in the items property of the Decoration Options
provided by the `/decorations/v1/decorationOptions` endpoint.

parameters.name: zAxisDecorationItem
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration item requested, returned in the items property of the Decoration Options
provided by the `/decorations/v1/decorationOptions` endpoint.

get.summary: Get the available decoration types given a list of SKUs

parameters.name: skus
parameters.description: An array of SKUs for which the data is being requested.

items.description: The SKU of the product for which the data is being requested.

get.summary: Get the available decoration types for a specific SKU

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: The SKU for which the data is requested.

parameters.name: withPositions
parameters.description: Whether to include a count of the number of positions.

get.summary: Get the available decoration positions for a SKU and decoration type

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: The SKU of the product for which the data is being requested.

parameters.name: decorationType
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration type requested, returned by the
`/decorations/v1/decorationTypes` endpoint.

get.summary: Get the acceptable logo sizes for a SKU, decoration type, decoration position, and decoration item

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: The SKU of the product for which the logo size is being requested.

parameters.name: decorationType
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration type requested, returned by the
`/decorations/v1/decorationTypes` endpoint.

parameters.name: decorationPosition
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration position requested, returned by the
`/decorations/v1/decorationPositions` endpoint.

parameters.name: decorationItem
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration item requested, returned in the items property of the Decoration Options
provided by the `/decorations/v1/decorationOptions` endpoint.

get.summary: Get the information sections for a SKU and decoration type

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: The SKU of the product for which the data is being requested.

parameters.name: decorationType
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration type requested, returned by the
`/decorations/v1/decorationTypes` endpoint.

get.summary: Get the decoration pricing for a SKU, decoration type, decoration item, z-axis decoration item at quantity

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: The SKU of the product for which pricing is requested.

parameters.name: decorationType
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration type requested, returned by the
`/decorations/v1/decorationTypes` endpoint.

parameters.name: decorationItem
parameters.description:
The ID of the decoration item requested, returned by the
`/decorations/v1/decorationOptions` endpoint.

parameters.name: zAxisDecorationItem
parameters.description:
The ID of the z-axis decoration item requested, returned by the
`/decorations/v1/decorationOptions` endpoint.

parameters.name: qty
parameters.description: The quantity of decorations being applied to the product.
